title: Traits and Features
content: hield Master: Block Class Feature If a spell forces you to make a Dexterity Saving Throw, you can use a reaction to shield yourself. On a failed Saving Throw, you only take halfdamage. On a successful Saving Throw, you don't take any damage. Shield Master (Feat) grants this feature. Skilled Class Feature You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.
